content: stitches from needle 1 this will be needle three you should now have 26 stitches each on needle 1 and needle 3 and 32 stitches on needle 2 knit one round in stockinette reduction round knit to the last three stitches on needle 1 k2tog k1 knit across needle 2 k1 ssk knit to end on needle 3 alternate a reduction round and a plain round until 16 stitches remain on needles 1 and 3 foot knit in stockinette until your sock measures 2 ½ less than your desired sock length toe reduction round needle 1 knit to the last three stitches k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk knit to the last three stitches k2tog k1 needle 3 k1 ssk knit to the end alternate reduction rounds and plain rounds until 32 stitches remain then knit reduction rounds every round until 12 stitches are left using needle 3 knit the three stitches of needle 1 graft the stitches from needle 3 and needle 2 together using kitchener stitch weave in ends knit another sock
